bill.title: Industrial Hemp; Two-year Industrial Hemp Remediation and Biofuel Crop Research Program; College of Tropical Agriculture and Human Resources; University of Hawaii
bill.description: Authorizes the Dean of the College of Tropical Agriculture and Human Resources at the University of Hawaii at Manoa to establish a two-year industrial hemp remediation and biofuel research program. Requires a final report to the legislature prior to the convening of the regular session of 2016. Defines industrial hemp. Repeals 07/01/2016. (SB2175 HD2)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to AGL/PSM, CPN/JDL.
The committee(s) on AGL/PSM has scheduled a public hearing on 02-11-14 2:20PM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on PSM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in PSM were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Espero, Baker, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Galuteria, Green.

The committee(s) on AGL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in AGL were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Nishihara, Kouchi, English, L. Thielen, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Wakai.
Reported from AGL/PSM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2373) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to CPN/JDL.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to CPN/JDL.
The committee(s) on CPN/JDL will hold a public decision making on 02-25-14 10:15AM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Nishihara, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Taniguchi, Slom.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Galuteria, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Solomon, Slom.
Reported from CPN/JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2531) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).

Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 2 (Hee, Shimabukuro). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 110) in amended form (SD 2).
Pass First Reading

Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org
The committee(s) on JUD recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 04-01-14 at 2:00pm.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 04-01-14 2:00PM in conference room 325.
